info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grant and northern Hidalgo Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Virden, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Lower Box and Gila Middle Box. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
